Detailed Description

CTreeNodeArtist.

Description: This class is responsible for painting nodes to the canvas on the screen.

Limitations: None

CTreeNodeArtist::paintModel.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:

void CTreeNodeArtist::paintModelHelper (  const STreeNode *  node,
QPainter *  painter
) 
 

CTreeNodeArtist::paintModelHelper.

Description: This function paints the given node and all its children, along with connecting lines up to its parent node by recursively calling itself on the child nodes of the given node.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The given node and all its children have been painted.
Parameters:
node,: This is a pointer to the node to paint.
painter,: This is a pointer to the QPainter to use for painting nodes to the screen.
Limitations: None

QPainter *  painter
) 
 

CTreeNodeArtist::paintNode.

Description: This function paints a single node to the screen. It draws the node using the given QPainter object.

Precondition:
None
Postcondition:
The given node is painted to the screen.
Parameters:
node,: This is a pointer to the node to be painted to the screen.
painter,: This is a pointer to the QPainter object to be used to paint the node on the screen.
Limitations: None
